boarddocs_structure_notes.search_returns: Document IDs that can be used to fetch file details
boarddocs_structure_notes.note: BoardDocs uses JavaScript heavily - direct API/search works better than page scraping

FY22_budget: Look for archived budget documents from 2021-2022
If not available online, file FOIA request to FCPS Finance Department
FY21_budget: Look for archived budget documents from 2020-2021
If not available online, file FOIA request to FCPS Finance Department
FY20_budget: Look for archived budget documents from 2019-2020
If not available online, file FOIA request to FCPS Finance Department
alternative_data_sources: VDOE Superintendent's Annual Report tables contain per-pupil expenditure data
Virginia APA Comparative Report contains education expenditure summaries
FCPS Annual Comprehensive Financial Reports (ACFR) contain audited financial data
